submission.title: DiCAMS: Dynamic Intelligent Context-Aware Memory System
submission.overview:
DiCAMS (Dynamic Intelligent Context-Aware Memory System) is a patent-pending cognitive infrastructure designed to give AI true continuity over time — across both structured and unstructured data. Most AI systems today — even those using RAG or agent-based architectures — lack persistent, intelligent memory. They retrieve information but don’t maintain continuity. DiCAMS solves this by generating a dynamic memory graph that grows and adapts with user input, real-world data, and contextual signals. Think of it as a scaffolded memory system that doesn’t just store — it organizes, summarizes, and forgets intelligently.

Where this matters most:
- Healthcare: longitudinal patient data contextualization
- Enterprise AI: evolving knowledge workflows
- Agent ecosystems: shared context and alignment

DiCAMS acts like a smart librarian — not only filing information but writing the index, linking the chapters, and updating the story as it unfolds. It’s not just a better retrieval system. It’s a meta-layer for cognition — the missing infrastructure for truly intelligent, user-aligned AI.

This submission was generated with protocol META-DP-EVAL-v1.3

directly_addressed_dps.summary: Supports ethical AI by maintaining contextual continuity and avoiding hallucinations or disjointed actions across time.
Establishes structured memory boundaries, enabling agents to retain context without uncontrolled knowledge accumulation.
Dynamic memory adapts based on real-world feedback and contextual learning, supporting evolving reputational frameworks.
Structured memory graphs enable fine-grained control and partitioning of personal or enterprise data.
Acts as a cognitive bridge across data types and systems, simplifying agent memory handling.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Continuity as a Foundation for Ethical AI
clarifications_and_extensions.clarification: DiCAMS ensures that AI systems don’t behave unpredictably due to memory loss or lack of context. Ethical behavior is reinforced by sustained situational awareness.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Many harms from AI arise from decontextualized interactions. Continuity is foundational to responsibility.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Dynamic Memory Containment for Multi-Agent Context Sharing
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Rather than confining an AI’s behavior via sandboxing alone, DiCAMS enables memory containment—scoping what an agent remembers or forgets per domain or task.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Context sharing between agents is powerful—but without containment, it creates security and alignment risks.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Memory-Informed Feedback Loops
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: The evolving structure of DiCAMS’ graph reflects interaction feedback, reputation signals, and relevance decay.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Feedback becomes more meaningful when it shapes what the system remembers and emphasizes.
